config.normalizeNamespaces.markdownDescr:
Decide what to do with special characters in a namespace. In case you have an invalid folder structure. For example, if you have a folder named `Money$$$`, the dollar signs (`$$$`) are invalid characters for a namespace. This setting will decide what to do with those characters. 

**Note**: White spaces will always be removed, regardless of this setting.
config.file.topOfTheFile:
Always add the following lines to the top of the file, for example you can add:

`using System.Text.Json;`

`from math import exp, expm1;`

 Those lines will be now added to any file created from now on.
